description: Winter running, meet your match. The Blizzard GTX utilizes a dynamic gaiter and integrated tungsten alloy spikes for maximum protection and grip in the most severe conditions. Ideal for cold weather training and competitions during the winter months, they offer reflective details, a super secure lacing harness, an exceptional fit and unmatched traction.
name: Blizzard GTX - Unisex

specs.value: Ortholite Hybrid With 5% Recycled Rubber + 15% Production Waste Foam
Soft and long lasting compound with good grip ideal for packed trails and mixed terrain
Waterproof membrane designed for maximum breathability during intense physical endeavors
Lug pattern with slanted and opposing angles to reduce impact forces and increase traction
Products are free of animal-derived materials
Eco-friendly and washable insole made from breathable and durable PU foam cells and recycled rubber
